bwwExcerpt: So Rourke's production seems so much gilding of the lily, as it were, making the points with as heavy a hand as possible. It's skillfully performed, sometimes visually arresting but mostly just plain crude. This is especially so in the performances Rourke draws from her stars....
wrongShowReason: Cross-show URL collision (revival, no signal): defaulting to most recent production les-liaisons-dangereuses-2016
